r.d: The Log package provides an abstracted logging framework. It includes output handlers for log files, databases, syslog, email, Firebug, and the console. It also provides composite and subject-observer logging mechanisms.
r.n: - It is now possible to configure the error_log handler's line and timestamp formats. (Bug #14655) - Added _extractMessage() support for non-scalar array('message' => ...) values. - Spaces in 'win' handler window names are now replaced with underscores. - Added a class name format token: %8$s
